Our Own Impacts
Our Own Impacts

• MA state-wide emissions are comparable to the total emissions of whole countries (i.e. Portugal, Egypt, Austria, or Greece). If the New England/ Eastern Canadian Region was classified as a country, it would be the 12th largest emitter of GHG in the world. • Add NY and NJ = 5th largest. • MA emits 1.9% of the total U.S. inventory with 2.4%
